skills.skill: Integration of Data from Multiple Sources

duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand business needs, identify solutions, and guide the business and IT teams in finding the best solution.
Support the definition of, and adherence to, Data Virtualization standards and principles on the Denodo Platform.
Experience in performance tuning of Denodo environment.
Collaborate with business teams to design, develop, and deploy data model solutions using the data virtualization tool.
Design and develop models, define and develop base, derived, and business views using Denodo.
Establish connectivity with sources/targets, and develop/configure on the platform.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, related field, or equivalent work experience
